category.name: Product Structure.RDV
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_user_defined_units_of_measure
preference.preference_description: Specifies a single-value mapping property that contains the value to prepopulate the Usage_Product note displayed in the Enter Part Data pane of the Add Part to Product wizard. Valid Values: METERS MILLIMETERS INCHES UNKNOWN
